name: @solidbasisventures/intelliwaketsfoundation
description: NPM package for IntelliWake TypeScript Foundation Components

scripts.BuildAndPublish: rm -rf dist/* && rollup -c && mv dist/src/* dist/ && rm -rf dist/src && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm publish
scripts.BuildAndPublishOLD: rm -rf dist/* && rollup -c && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm publish

author: SolidBasisVentures
